alert.note: Alert for Beauregard (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 10:53AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Beauregard Parish, Tyler, Newton, Hardin, northwestern Orange and Jasper Counties through 1145 AM CDT... At 1052 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Ebenezer to Town Bluff to near Batson. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Beaumont, Orange, Lumberton, Vidor, Jasper, Silsbee, Woodville, Newton, Kirbyville, Kountze, Colmesneil, Evadale, Rockland, Town Bluff, Thicket, Toledo Bend Dam, Ebenezer, Fred, Bon Weir and Burkeville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
